parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From apo and hiemi; to send forth, in various applications.
